resources.string: 1. The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
2. Be as you wish to seem.
3. True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.
1. He is richest who is content with the least, for content is the wealth of nature.
2. I am the wisest man alive, for I know one thing, and that is that I know nothing.
3. He is a man of courage who does not run away, but remains at his post and fights against the enemy.
